archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: SendGrid/MailChimp/MailJet
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: SendGrid/MailChimp/MailJet - these are the three options available and after RFP process one of them should be the DX vendor. Just for FYI, our current platform is based on iQHive systems which is outdated and not fit-for-purpose based on business/operational and architectural evaluation.
